textBox.richText: If you use Icloud photos like me then you’ll be annoyed that Apple photos app was not made for Mavericks. The best alternative to this I could find is using Chrome-Legacy by blueboxd, an up to date Chrome browser for 10.7-10.10. I would recommend using this to make a desktop chrome app by going to the three dots on the top right > More Tools > Create Shortcut and check open as new window. You can now add this to your dock. Obviously you’ll have to keep chrome open while this works, but it works quite nicely.
